input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Williams F1 Men's Core Jersey'
  - Name='Vis Men's Core Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pro Men's Midweight Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Tech Jersey - Conifer Chaos, 3XL | Cycling Jersey | Pedal Mafia'
  - Name='Nomadic Tech Short Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Pro Short Sleeve Merino Baselayer'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Sleeveless Base Layer'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Base Layer'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Core Bib'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Delta Jersey'
  - Name='Williams F1 Men's Core Bib'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Delta Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Vapour Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Classic Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Attack Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Glitch Bomber Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Sportful Matchey Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Men's Classic Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Pro Short Sleeve Base Layer'
  - Name='Sportful SRK Set'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Williams F1 Men's Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares 'Core Jersey' naming convention and is likely a short sleeve cycling jersey targeting cyclists, but may have specific branding or slight differences in materials/features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vis Men's Core Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar in function (cycling jersey) and target audience, but is long sleeve rather than short sleeve, altering its intended use and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pro Men's Midweight Thermal Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are cycling jerseys, but the competitor's 'midweight thermal' feature implies heavier, warmer construction for colder weather rather than the lightweight, highly breathable focus of the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tech Jersey - Conifer Chaos, 3XL | Cycling Jersey | Pedal Mafia
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jersey from the same brand, almost certainly sharing construction, fit, and use case; likely only differs in minor tech details or design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nomadic Tech Short Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve, but a technical t-shirt rather than a structured cycling jersey; lacks typical cycling features like rear pockets and cycling-specific fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Pro Short Sleeve Merino Baselayer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A base layer (worn under a jersey), not an outer cycling jersey. Different intended use, materials, and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Sleeveless Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A sleeveless base layer is a completely different garment category, worn under jerseys and not offering pockets or structured support.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Essentially the same product as the reference but for women; construction, purpose, and features are directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A top-tier women's cycling jersey from the same brand, likely similar in all key features to the Core Jersey apart from premium materials or fit tuning.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A base layer, not a jersey, lacking the cycling jersey's outerwear features like rear pockets and zippers.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling bib short is a bottom garment, unrelated in function or silhouette to a jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Core Bib
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A pair of bib shorts, which serve an entirely different function in cycling attire than a jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another bib short; not a cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Delta Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A women's cycling jersey from the same brand, likely very similar to the Core Jersey but potentially with advanced features or fit differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Williams F1 Men's Core Bib
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling bib shorts, not a jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Delta Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve version of a cycling pro jersey, which is close but less directly comparable due to sleeve length and potential thermal features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Vapour Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's cycling jersey from the same brand, high similarity in use and features, possibly differentiated by fabric or ventilation tech.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Direct women's counterpart to the reference product with almost identical features and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Classic Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's short sleeve cycling jersey intended for similar use, from a well-known cycling brand. High likely functional and structural similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Attack Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's cycling jersey, probably comparable in function and design but may differ in fit or fabric technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Glitch Bomber Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jersey with a potentially different cut or aesthetic ('Bomber'), but intended for the same use and with similar features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Sportful Matchey Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's cycling jersey likely similar in application and construction, though may have brand-specific design adjustments.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Men's Classic Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's classic short sleeve cycling jersey, very comparable to the reference in silhouette, features, and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Pro Short Sleeve Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve base layer is meant to be worn under a jersey, not as an outer garment. Different use case and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful SRK Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: The term 'set' implies a kit or bundle, and it's unclear what garments are included; not directly a single comparable product.
